api.name: ObUnsavedChangesTabsDirective
api.usage: Applied on a <form> or any element with ngModelGroup directive. The host element needs either an id or be wrapped in a ngbNavItem directive.

api.name: ObUnsavedChangesTabService
api.usage: This service handles the unsaved changes monitored by the ObUnsavedChangesTabsDirective. It should only be accessed through the ObUnsavedChangesGuard or the ObUnsavedChangesTabsDirective

methods.name: watch
methods.text: Starts watching the given form for changes.

methods.name: unWatch
methods.text: Stops watching the given form for changes

methods.name: canDeactivate
methods.text: Checks if there are unsaved changes in the watched forms and ask for confirmation if there are.

methods.name: ignoreChanges
methods.text: Same as canDeactivate but limited to the given form
